answers.answer: i don't think you have anything to worry about, loads of men and women with diabetes go on to have healthy children.  Don't worry about it so much

question: We are going to TTC in the near future. My husband is a Type 1 Diabetic - he is under good control. I am going to start taking prenatal vitamins this week. I am on a multi-vitamin for women right now. I was wondering if there are any special vitamins that I should be taking above and beyound the regular prenatal vitamin because he is diabetic. I would like to reduce the chances - if any of having complications because of his diabetes. I was told that we should have no problems conceiving because he is healty and under control
title: Becoming pregnant with a Diabetic husband
